name: Office Brawl (Dragov)
description:
Office Brawl is an online multiplayer PvP shooter game 

Current Game Version - Ver 1.0

Host or join  PvP matches with 3 different game modes :

  • DeathMatch - Player with most kills win.
  • Teams - Team with most kills win.
  • Capture The Flag - Team with most flag capture win.

Connect to match using :

  • Steam - connect to remote players in the same region as you 
  • Local network connection - play with friends that are connected on the same network as you .

Game include :

  • 3 different maps to play 
  • 7 weapons with ammo and 1 grenade 

Important note : 

  • IMPORTANT - all players have to use the same agent version to connect .
  • You can always check this page for the updated game version.

Hope you enjoy the game .
